name: GMTK5-John's Submission
description:
In this game, you play as a superhero who was captured by the super villain. You and the villains body were joined together. You are now trapped, and are trying to escape to stop the villain from using your body for evil. To escape his evil lair, you need to solve simple puzzles, or move past security cameras at the right time to avoid detection. (This project was created by a solo developer, and my specialty is programming, not art. Please excuse the comically bad art)

*Some textures are downloaded from Texturelib.com. Everything else is created during the jam*
